member.name: TF_PRESERVEDKEY
member.summary: The TF_PRESERVEDKEY structure represents a preserved key.

member.name: TF_PRESERVEDKEY.uVKey
member.summary: Virtual key code of the keyboard shortcut.

member.name: TF_PRESERVEDKEY.uModifiers
member.summary: Modifies the preserved key. This can be zero or a combination of one or more of the TF_MOD_* constants.
